$!You must tell DVLA if you suffer from dizziness.$!

%You can be fined up to £1,000 if you don’t tell DVLA about a medical condition that affects your driving. If you’re involved in an accident, you may be prosecuted.%

##Car or motorcycle licence

###Vertebrobasilar giddiness

You must tell DVLA. Fill in form B1 and send it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download 'B1 - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 315KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_066652.pdf "Download 'B1 - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 3115KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

###Other diziness/giddiness

You must tell DVLA. Fill in form DIZ1 and send it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download 'DIZ1 - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 182KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_065610.pdf "Download 'DIZ1 - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 182KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

##Bus, coach or lorry licence 

###Vertebrobasilar giddiness

You must tell DVLA. Fill in forms B1 and FEB1V and send them to DVLA. The address is on the forms.

$D
[Download 'B1 - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 315KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_066652.pdf "Download 'B1 - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 3115KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

$D
[Download 'FEP1V - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 355KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_185934.pdf "Download 'FEB1V - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 355KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

###Other diziness/giddiness

You must tell DVLA. Fill in form DIZ1 and send it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download 'DIZ1V - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 261KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_4018276.pdf "Download 'DIZ1V - Confidential medical information' (PDF, 261KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D


*[DVLA]: Driver Vehicle and Licensing Agency

title: Dizziness (giddiness) and driving
